title: Drawing, August 1844
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center left:  Lugt 457c.
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at upper right:  Aug 1844.

Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at upper right:  Sep 1844; again, at center left: bright / darker.
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of a standing child, shown from the right wearing a broad-brimmed hat and adjusting his socks, details of legs of cows and a tree.
Verso: Horizontal cloud study over a view from the bluffs above the Hudon River looking toward the Catskill Mountains.
